Rostora

General Information

Demonym Rostoran
Flavor Text "Upholding the sancity of a promise."
Faction Color Red
Peoples Albian
Class List Rifle, Grenadier, Engineer, Shotgun, Assault Engine

Overview

Rostora is a nation in the continent of Pordier. Oskovia boasts a well-equipped army and is in conflict with Rostora and the disputed territory of Borden.

Appearance

In-game, the Rostoran uniform is reddish-grey.

Trivia

  • Oskovia used to also fight Rostora in the old Umbral map...
  • Soldiers wear the same helmet models as Rostora...
